title: Example title
description: Documentation for each field in the ReportStream schema [placeholder]

items.name: Patient ID
notes: Enter unique patient identifier. This is typically the Medical Record Number. Do not send a Social Security Number. This value is not required but preferred and required by some states.

items.name: Patient last name
notes: Enter patient’s last name. File will fail if field left blank.

items.name: Patient first name
notes: Enter patient’s last name. File will fail if field left blank.

items.name: Patient middle name
notes: Enter patient’s middle name.

items.name: Patient street address
notes: Enter patient's street address. File will fail if field left blank.
For homeless or other scenarios when no information is given, populate this field with ** Homeless ** or ** Unknown / Not Given **

items.name: Patient street address line 2
notes: Secondary address information for apartment, suite, etc.

items.name: Patient city
notes: Enter patient’s city. File will fail if field left blank.
For homeless or other scenarios when no information is given, populate this field with the Ordering Facility's information.

items.name: Patient state
values: Two-character state abbreviation, ex: MD, VT, TX
notes: Enter patient’s state using the two-character state abbreviation. File will fail if field left blank.
For homeless or other scenarios when no information is given, populate this field with the Ordering Facilities information.

items.name: Patient county
notes: Enter patient’s county/parish name.

items.name: Patient zip code
notes: Enter patient’s zip code. File will fail if value is not entered using acceptable format or field is left blank.
For homeless or other scenarios when no information is given, populate field with the Ordering Facility's information.

items.name: Patient phone number
notes: Enter patient’s phone number. File will fail if value is not entered using acceptable format or field is left blank.
For homeless or other scenarios when no information is given, populate field with the Ordering Facilities information.

items.name: Patient date of birth
notes: Enter patient’s date of birth. File will fail if value is not entered using acceptable format or field is left blank.

items.name: Patient gender
notes: Enter patient's gender. File will fail if value not entered using acceptable values or field is left blank.

items.name: Patient race
values: 2076-8 or Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander
notes: File will fail if numeric values or text values are not entered using acceptable values or field is left blank.

items.name: Patient ethnicity
notes: File will fail if numeric values or text values are not entered using accepted values or field is left blank.

items.name: Acession number
notes: An Accession number is a unique ID that identifies a single result.
If the Accession Number is unknown, leave the field blank. ReportStream will generate a unique ID using the following information: patient_id + Row# + Today’s date (example: ID123+5+20211223).

items.name: Test kit name ID
values: BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of SARS-CoV-2_Becton, Dickinson and Company (BD)
BD Veritor System for Rapid Detection of SARS-CoV-2 & Flu A+B_Becton, Dickinson and Company (BD)
RightSign COVID-19 IgG/IgM Rapid Test Cassette_Hangzhou Biotest Biotech Co., Ltd.
notes: Enter Test kit Name ID value from Department of Health and Human Services' (HHS) LOINC Mapping spreadsheet. File will fail if value not entered using acceptable values or field is left blank.
Go to https://www.cdc.gov/csels/dls/sars-cov-2-livd-codes.html. Click on the Mapping Tool labeled "LIVD SARS-CoV-2 Test Codes.xlsx" (the file will download to your computer).
Locate the saved file on your computer and open the file. Click on the "LOINC Mapping" tab. Go to Column M labeled "Testkit Name ID" to locate the corresponding value to enter

items.name: Test performed code
notes: Enter TestPerformed Code value from Department of Health and Human Services' (HHS) LOINC Mapping spreadsheet. File will fail if value not entered using acceptable values or field is left blank.
Use the same Mapping Tool labeled "LIVD SARS-CoV-2 Test Codes.xlsx". From the LOINC Mapping tab, go to Column F labeled "Test Performed LOINC Code". Locate the corresponding value to enter.

items.name: Test result
notes: File will fail if value is not entered using accepted text values or SNOMED codes, or if the field is left blank.
Enter a value from the Common Values listed.

If needed, can use the same Mapping Tool labeled "LIVD SARS-CoV-2 Test Codes.xlsx" to locate SNOMED code values instead. From the "LOINC Mapping" tab, go to Column Column E labeled Vendor Result Description. Locate SNOMED code value and enter into field (Example: Positive = 260373001).

items.name: Order test date
notes: Enter order test date. File will fail if value is not entered using acceptable format or field is left blank.

items.name: Specimen collection date
notes: Enter speciment collection date. If unknown, populate field with the order_test_date. In most cases, these are the same. Can be left blank if same as order_test_date.

items.name: Testing lab specimen received date
notes: Enter the testing lab speciment received date. If unknown, populate field with the order_test_date value. In most cases, these are the same. Can be left blank if same as order_test_date.

items.name: Test result date
notes: Enter test result date. File will fail if value is not entered using acceptable format or field is left blank.

items.name: Date result released
notes: Enter test result date. If unknown, populate field with the test_result_date value. In most cases, these are the same. Can be left blank if same as order_test_date.

items.name: Specimen type
notes: File will fail if value not entered using acceptable text values or SNOMED codes or field is left blank.

Use the same Mapping Tool labeled "LIVD SARS-CoV-2 Test Codes.xlsx". From the 'LOINC Mapping' tab, go to Column D labeled "Vendor Specimen Description". Locate the corresponding text value or SNOMED code and enter into field (Example: Anterior Nares Swab = "697989009").

items.name: Ordering provider ID
notes: Enter NPI. If NPI unknown, enter local coding. File will fail if field left blank.
NPI is a 10-position all-numeric identification number assigned by the NPS to uniquely identify a health care provider. NPIs can be found at https://npiregistry.cms.hhs.gov/.

items.name: Ordering provider last name
notes: Enter the last name of the ordering provider. File will fail if field left blank.

items.name: Ordering provider first name
notes: Enter the first name of the ordering provider. File will fail if field left blank.

items.name: Ordering provider middle name
notes: Enter the middle name of the ordering provider, if known. This value is optional and can be left blank if no information is provided.

items.name: Ordering provider street address
notes: Enter the street address of the ordering provider. File will fail if field left blank.

items.name: Ordering provider street address line 2
notes: Enter ordering provider’s additional address information, if applicable. This value is optional and can be left blank if no information is provided.

items.name: Ordering provider city
notes: Enter ordering provider’s city. File will fail if field left blank.

items.name: Ordering provider state
values: Two-character state abbreviation, ex: MD, VT, TX.
notes: Enter ordering provider’s state. File will fail if field left blank.

items.name: Ordering provider zip code
notes: Enter ordering provider zip code. File will fail if value is not entered using accepted format or field is left blank.

items.name: Ordering provider phone number
notes: Enter ordering provider’s phone number. File will fail if value is not entered using accepted format or field is left blank.

items.name: Testing lab CLIA number
notes: Enter testing lab’s CLIA number. File will fail if left blank.
CLIA numbers can be found at https://www.cdc.gov/clia/LabSearch.html .

items.name: Testing lab name
notes: Enter testing lab’s name. File will fail if field left blank.

items.name: Testing lab street address
notes: Enter the street address of the testing lab. File will fail if field left blank.

items.name: Testing lab street address line 2
notes: Enter testing lab’s additional address information, if applicable. This value is optional and can be left blank if no information is provided.

items.name: Testing lab city
notes: Enter testing lab’s city. File will fail if field left blank.

items.name: Testing lab state
values: Two-character state abbreviation, ex: MD, VT, TX.
notes: Enter ordering provider’s state. File will fail if field left blank.

items.name: Testing lab zip code
notes: Enter testing lab zip code. File will fail if value is not entered using accepted format or field is left blank.

items.name: Testing lab phone number
notes: Enter testing lab’s phone number. File will fail if value is not entered using accepted format or field is left blank.

items.name: Pregnant
notes: Enter patient’s pregnancy status. Field is not required, but requested for thorough reporting. Enter one of the acceptable values exactly as displayed.

items.name: Employed in healthcare
notes: Enter patient’s employment in healthcare status. Field is not required, but requested for thorough reporting. Enter one of the acceptable values exactly as displayed.

items.name: Symptomatic for disease
notes: Enter patient’s symptomatic for disease status. Field is not required, but requested for thorough reporting. Enter one of the acceptable values exactly as displayed.

items.name: Illness onset date
notes: Enter patient’s illness onset date.  Field is not required, but requested for thorough reporting. Enter value using accebtable format displayed.

items.name: Resident congregate setting
notes: Enter patient’s congregate housing status. Field is not required, but requested for thorough reporting. Enter one of the acceptable values exactly as displayed.

items.name: Hospitalized
notes: Enter patient’s hospitalization status. Field is not required, but requested for thorough reporting. Enter one of the acceptable values exactly as displayed.

items.name: Intensive care unit
notes: Enter patient’s intensive care unit (ICU) status.  Field is not required, but requested for thorough reporting. Enter one of the acceptable values exactly as displayed.

items.name: Ordering facility name
notes: Enter ordering facility name. Can be left blank if same as testing_lab_name.

items.name: Ordering facility street address
notes: Enter the street address of the ordering facility. Can be left blank if same as testing_lab_street.

items.name: Ordering facility street address line 2
notes: Enter ordering facility’s additional address information, if applicable. This value is optional and can be left blank if no information is provided.

items.name: Ordering facility city
notes: Enter ordering facility’s city. Can be left blank if same as testing_lab_city.

items.name: Ordering facility state
values: Two-character state abbreviation, ex: MD, VT, TX.
notes: Enter ordering facility’s state. Can be left blank if same as testing_lab_state.

items.name: Ordering facility zip code
notes: Enter ordering facility zip code. Can be left blank if same as testing_lab_zip_code.

items.name: Ordering facility phone number
notes: Enter ordering facility phone number. Can be left blank if same as testing_lab_phone_number.
